mapper.sql: ID, GOODS_CODE, GOODS_SN, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_DEMO_INFO ( GOODS_CODE, GOODS_SN, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{goodsCode}, #{goodsSn}, 0, now(), now(), 0 )

INSERT INTO WD_DEMO_INFO ( GOODS_CODE, GOODS_SN, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION ) VALUES
( #{item.goodsCode}, #{item.goodsSn}, 0, now(), now(), 0 )
